name: Streamsx.sparkmllib
tagline: Toolkit for real-time scoring using Apache Spark's machine learning library
body:
### Overview
Apache Spark is a fast general purpose clustering system. By allowing user's programs to load data into the cluster's memory and query it repeatedly, it is well suited for machine learning algorithms. MLlib is a machine learning library provided by Spark with support for common machine learning algorithms including classification, regression, collaborative filtering and others. The purpose of this project is to allow Spark's MLlib library to be used for real-time scoring of data in InfoSphere Streams.

For more information on how to get started, refer to the  [Getting Started guide](gettingstarted.html)

Documentation for the toolkit is available [here](com.ibm.streamsx.messaging/doc/spldoc/html/index.html)
